insert into five_ed_plot_apply_detail (plot_apply_id, frame_size, frame_number, frame_lengthen, frame_no, remark, is_deleted) values (#{plotApplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frameSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameLengthen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update five_ed_plot_apply_detail set plot_apply_id = #{plotApplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frame_size = #{frameSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_number = #{frameNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_lengthen = #{frameLengthen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frame_no = #{frameNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, plot_apply_id, frame_size, frame_number, frame_lengthen, frame_no, remark, is_deleted from five_ed_plot_apply_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, plot_apply_id, frame_size, frame_number, frame_lengthen, frame_no, remark, is_deleted from five_ed_plot_apply_detail
order by id desc
